about_the_game:
A lewd branching tale of blackmail and debauchery. You play a plain-faced lifeguard who abandoned hisdreams of coaching monster athletics after surviving a life-threatening accident. You've since reserved yourself to working at the local fitness center and taking a backseat.

Your laid-back attitude in the company of the locals and your childhood friend earns the scorn and ire of a fire-breathing dragon, with giant tits and a nasty attitude.

Freya Knox has set her sights on you and wants nothing more than to ruin the life you've built... for sheer entertainment, and to wring every drop from you that she possibly can.


Will you pin her down and put her in her place by force, or try to reason with the beast?

content_descriptors.notes:
Game contains scenes of dubious sexual consent between both the protagonist and antagonist.

Game contains an ending in which a sudden and violent death is briefly described and alluded to but not explicitly shown.

Your laid-back attitude in the company of the locals and your childhood friend earns the scorn and ire of a fire-breathing dragon, with giant tits and a nasty attitude.

Freya Knox has set her sights on you and wants nothing more than to ruin the life you've built... for sheer entertainment, and to wring every drop from you that she possibly can.


Will you pin her down and put her in her place by force, or try to reason with the beast?

fullgame.name: Slay the Dragon! The Fire-Breathing Tyrant Meets Her Match!

name: Slay the Dragon! The Fire-Breathing Tyrant Meets Her Match! Demo
short_description: Play the role of an unassuming lifeguard, trapped beneath the claws of a dragon girl with massive tits and a nasty attitude. Talk your way out of her blackmail, or pin her down and end her reign of terror by force. Choose your weapon to "slay" the dragon.
